config.EditTagKey.name: Edit Tag Key
config.EditTagKey.desc:
While in a character profile page, press this key to edit the relationship tag.
While on the social page, hold this key and click on a NPC entry to edit the relationship tag.
While on the animal page, hold this key and click on an animal entry to edit the relationship tag.
config.EnableDefaultTags.name: Enable Default Tags
config.EnableDefaultTags.desc: Check this option to enable default tags added by other mods via content edits. These will be shown when you didn't set any tags for a particular NPC. No effect on animals.
